name: java from devcontainer-essentials
description: Install Java Development Kit with support for OpenJDK and Eclipse Temurin distributions. Includes optional Apache Maven and Gradle build tools. Supports Java versions 8, 11, 16, 17, 21, and latest with automatic JAVA_HOME configuration.

version.description: Select Java version: 8 (legacy), 11 (LTS), 16, 17 (LTS), 21 (LTS), or latest (recommended for new projects)

installMaven.description: Install Apache Maven build automation and project management tool for Java projects

installGradle.description: Install Gradle modern build automation tool with Kotlin DSL support

jdkDistro.description: Java distribution: 'openjdk' (default system packages) or 'temurin' (Eclipse Adoptium - recommended for enterprise)
